attributes.action: Challenge whether the EU referendum result is valid if voters were misled
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum result was won on a false premise if the British people were misled.
 
As there is no way back from Great Britain leaving the European Union, should parliament accept the result of the referendum when the result was potentially influenced by misinformation
attributes.background:
The Leave Campaign’s “Let’s give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week” statement was evidently a key factor in the Leave campaign’s referendum victory.
 
However, it is increasingly clear that members of the Leave campaign have no intention of honouring the promises they made.

rejection.details:
If you want a public inquiry into the referendum campaign, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139525
